children.comment: 2/2 In situations of extreme anxiety, reaching out for help is often the very hardest part. I promise, after that it becomes easier.

children.comment: I LOVE meeting new people, but I can never find a way to relate to new people and not come off as creepy/weird. I'm scared they hate me

data.comment: Most people don't have legitimate social anxiety (esp those on here).  They're just lazy and won't put the effort in to interact with people
